title: Hero Electric expects to double its two-wheeler sales in FY24
description: "There were constraints in the availability of semiconductors, which have now eased. Momentum in the market is good. We will close this fiscal with sales of about 100,000 units and aim to grow by 1.7-2.2 times in the next financial year," Munjal, who is the managing director (MD) at Hero Electric, told ET.
